directions: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Saute carrot, celery and onion until soft. Add garlic and saute briefly. Stir in tomato sauce, chicken broth, pepper, parsley and basil; simmer for 20 minutes.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add ditalini pasta and cook for 8 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Add beans to the sauce mixture and simmer for a few minutes.  When pasta is done, stir into sauce and bean mixture.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
title: Easy Pasta Fagioli
